long_description: Low-key styling and the supple feel of suede leather give these classic flip-flops a nicer look than the standard black. Quality suede leather straps with polyester lining softly cradle insteps and resist stretching; pliable polyester between the toes is comfortable. On size 9K/10K only, polyester heel straps slip over small heels to keep flip-flops from flip-flopping right off. Suede leather footbeds are contoured for arch support and perforated for quick drying. Triple-density EVA topsoles with contoured arches and EVA midsoles support cradle and cushion feet. High density EVA outsoles provide excellent traction on all kinds of surfaces.
short_description: Low-key styling and the supple feel of suede leather give these classic flip-flops a nicer look than the standard black.
